author: giacomo
msg: Added a sample which shows the use of a slightly complexer sample by use of actions and action-sets. This sample is not really working (does not update any database tables) because I've seen that a general component for JDBC connection pooling would be handy. For Cocoon 2 the Turbine connection pool is not suitable because the design of Turbine Services it totally different that the one we use. I
think we should have one coded as a Component and made available to all component through the cocoon.xconf file.

author: giacomo
msg: Updated with examples how to use action and actions-set.

author: giacomo
msg: Changed getUri() to the conformant getURI() in all classes
